text: Lavɨla Isɨlaelɨ hɨdɨlɨ agɨladɨ abɨha uami. Isɨlaelɨ hɨdɨlɨ naludɨ ninadinalu ajihalinalu agɨlaŋ mufɨli mufɨli akuaba akuaba Asɨ saŋ lɨbɨmɨŋɨben aba hameŋ laci ala lɨhavɨm aba abɨha uami. Cihu savu me hɨhɨle agɨladɨdaŋ kɨlɨ olivɨ agɨladɨ amɨŋ agɨladɨ mɨtɨ agadɨdaŋ eŋalavɨbali hameŋ ala eŋala eŋala mɨŋamɨjimɨji lɨbɨmɨŋavɨm aba abɨha uami.
